OOC: Ok, this is regarding Zone 5 and Orchestra and Darkfate and stuff.  Is=
 someone attacking?  What is happening now?  I am a little confused
OOC2: O=
k, Soulstice, I posted Symphony firing machine gun rounds at Sqawktalk, but=
 obviously you missed the post or just didn't bother reading.  And this may=
 not be the situation, but this is directed to everybody: READ EVERY SINGLE=
 POST!  You do not have to read each one thoroughly, you can just scroll th=
rough it quickly.  I read every post now, ever since I missed some big even=
ts and learned my lesson, lol. 

::Symphony/Triggerhappy::

          Symph=
ony looked at Firearm.  Poor Firearm!  Symphony looked in the distance and =
heard a ship or something.  He looked up at Menasor, and was a little afrai=
d, but he would do anything to show loyalty to his faction, so he fired 25 =
machine gun rounds at Menasor, aiming for the head which was high up, and t=
he sun sort of bothered his optics.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~
           Triggerhappy laughed at Astro Train and his buddies.

     =
      "You really think you can destroy me?  Well guess what, I'm sorry to =
say, but that's the wrong answer!  Now, come back to the show some other ti=
me!  That is, if you live to see some other time!!!  DIE!" He said.

      =
        The cockpit windshield closed and secured Blowpipe.  Triggerhappy f=
ired 2 photon cannon blasts at Astro Train.
